text: 15.19: Stt 8.21; Snd 6.14; Jer 17.9; Mt 12.34; Mk 7.21Gu kha khesharigi bigi, nta guma ndɨkndɨgar kegap, ana kamthoon kɨrar hi, gu nta nzuai. Nta khare, ndɨkndɨgi mbatɨgi, guma sogim ana rimgi, mbarkɨrga tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbuav ruarin mbigi gu gumgi wari ndiav ki, mani gu mburi wari thamthav ruarin harigi gumgi gu mbigi kɨɨi, fhura gumgi gugugap mbe nzuav nzuai, buni mbatɨgi harigi ntɨɨri ga nzuai.
